name: geomancy
effect: Takes one turn to charge, then raises the user's Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
The user absorbs energy and sharply raises
its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats
on the next turn.
